trans-unit.source: Get File Service Properties
trans-unit.target: Get File Service Properties

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get File Service Properties</languageKeyword> operation gets the properties for the File service, including properties for CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get File Service Properties</languageKeyword> operation gets the properties for the File service, including properties for CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

trans-unit.source: Supported in Version 2015-02-21 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Version 2015-02-21 and later.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about CORS rules and evaluation logic, see <externalLink><linkText>Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn535601.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed information about CORS rules and evaluation logic, see <externalLink><linkText>Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn535601.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get File Service Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get File Service Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: GET
trans-unit.target: GET

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Note that the URI must always include the forward slash (/) to separate the host name from the path and query portions of the URI.
trans-unit.target: Note that the URI must always include the forward slash (/) to separate the host name from the path and query portions of the URI.

trans-unit.source: In the case of this operation, the path portion of the URI is empty.
trans-unit.target: In the case of this operation, the path portion of the URI is empty.

trans-unit.source: URI PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: URI PARAMETERS

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: restype=service&comp=properties
trans-unit.target: restype=service&comp=properties

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The combination of both query strings is required to set the storage service properties.
trans-unit.target: The combination of both query strings is required to set the storage service properties.

trans-unit.source: Timeout
trans-unit.target: Timeout

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn689089.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn689089.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: x-ms-client-request-id
trans-unit.target: x-ms-client-request-id

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>About Storage Analytics Logging</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/hh343262.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>About Storage Analytics Logging</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/hh343262.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body:

trans-unit.source: Groups all CORS rules.
trans-unit.target: Groups all CORS rules.

trans-unit.source: Groups settings for a CORS rule.
trans-unit.target: Groups settings for a CORS rule.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of origin domains that are allowed via CORS, or "*" if all domains are allowed.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of origin domains that are allowed via CORS, or "*" if all domains are allowed.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of response headers to expose to CORS clients.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of response headers to expose to CORS clients.

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.
trans-unit.target: The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of headers allowed to be part of the cross-origin request.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of headers allowed to be part of the cross-origin request.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods that are allowed to be executed by the origin.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods that are allowed to be executed by the origin.

trans-unit.source: For Azure Storage, permitted methods are DELETE, GET, HEAD, MERGE, POST, OPTIONS or PUT.
trans-unit.target: For Azure Storage, permitted methods are DELETE, GET, HEAD, MERGE, POST, OPTIONS or PUT.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the storage account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the storage account owner may call this operation.
